generic.rebuild_required: {yellow}Your server container needs to be rebuilt. This should only take a few seconds, but could take a few minutes. You do not need to do anything else while this occurs. Your server will automatically continue with startup once this process is completed.
generic.rebuild_in_progress: {yellow}Please wait while your server is being rebuilt.
generic.rebuild_complete: {cyan}Completed rebuild process for server. Server is now booting.
generic.logs_throttled: {yellow}Your server is sending too much data too quickly! Automatic spam detection triggered.
generic.resource_limits_modified: {warning}Your server has had some resource limits modified, you may need to restart to apply them.
generic.aborting_reboot: {red}Aborting automatic reboot due to crash within the last 60 seconds.
generic.crash_detected_rebooting: {red}Server process detected as entering a crashed state; rebooting.
generic.crash_detected: {bgRed}---------- Detected server process in a crashed state! ----------

health.detected_map_change: {yellow}Detected on-going map change, pausing Health Monitor...
health.map_change_timeout: {yellow}Map change is taking over 3 minutes, assuming Health Monitor can be resumed...

errors.unable_to_read_log_file: An error was encountered while attempting to read the log file!
errors.preflight_file_parse:
Encountered an error while processing {file} -- this could lead to issues running the server.
{message}
errors.no_egg_configuration: No server egg configuration could be located; aborting startup.
errors.no_stop_configuration: No stop configuration is defined for this egg.
errors.fatal_start_error: A fatal error was encountered starting this server.
errors.disk_space_violation: Server is violating disk space limits, stopping process! {current}M / {limit}M

socket.trouble_connecting: We're having some trouble connecting to your server, please wait...
socket.couldnt_validate_permissions: There was an error validating the credentials provided for the websocket. Please refresh the page.
socket.no_permission: You do not have permission to access the websocket for this server.
socket.no_upload_permission: You do not have permission to access the upload websocket for this server.
socket.invalid_namespace: The server's websocket was not found on the daemon, please refresh the page.

steam_workshop.no_access_to_this_feature: You have no access to this feature.
steam_workshop.internal_server_error: Something went wrong while trying to fetch the workshop item, try again later.
steam_workshop.invalid_http_code: Received HTTP code {code} when trying to fetch the workshop item.
steam_workshop.no_results: Couldn't find any results for the workshop item.
steam_workshop.invalid_json: Received invalid JSON when trying to fetch the workshop item.
steam_workshop.failed_getting_collection: Unable to get the collection items from the provided workshop item.
steam_workshop.unable_to_resolve_file_size: Unable to resolve the file size for the workshop item.
steam_workshop.exceeds_download_size_limit: The item exceeds the max downloadable content size of {max_content_size} (item size is {item_size})
steam_workshop.unable_to_resolve_file_name: Unable to resolve the file name for the workshop item.
steam_workshop.failed_to_download_workshop_item: Failed to download the workshop item {title}.
steam_workshop.failed_to_connect_to_steam: Failed connecting to steam servers to be able to retrieve the download URL for {title}
steam_workshop.item_does_not_exist: The item {title} doesn't seem to exist.
steam_workshop.failed_getting_additional_information: Failed getting additional information for {title} (does the steam user own this game?)
